## Problem 1

*USA Today* maintains a data base of Major League Baseball player salaries (http://www.usatoday.com/sports/mlb/salaries/2016/player/all/). Answer the following questions about this data set.

a. Identify the cases.
b. Identify the variables.
c. Classify each variable as either quantitative or categorical.
